attributes.review: I came here to see what all the white kids in my neighborhood where talking about. Must have been the wrong restaurant. This place had terrible service and a long waiting time. Almost four years. Terrible. Don’t recommend, will never eat here again.

this app gave my phone so many viruses,I can barely use my phone now. all the negativity that exudes from this app has truly ruined my life. my vibe ? completely killed by this app. disgusting. not to mention how long it took to download, jesus. this app, to put it simply is a flaming piece of toxic waste. garbage.

attributes.review: I was so excited to get the app but I am extremely disappointed. The app crashes every few minutes, it is hard to navigate, and the set up process was confusing and difficult. I do not recommend!
attributes.title: Disappointed!

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, I was notified that the FBI are now tracking my location, and I got scared and wanted to delete the app but before I could delete it asked me to vote for trump or your a democratic idiot. Which disgusted me simply because a president should be professional not calling people IDIOTS!!! HORRIBLE AND I UNINSTALLED WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!🤬😡

attributes.review: Easy to use and runs well. Haven’t had any problems since using it. TRUMP 2020 ❤️🇺🇸

Like not everyone can get a small loan of a million dollars ese😔 but w.e foos don’t download the app🤮
